patthana3.13:185.1_0: Pariyāpannaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pariyāpanno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:186.1_0: Apariyāpannaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca apariyāpanno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:188.1_0: Pariyāpannaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pariyāpanno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:189.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:191.1_0: Pariyāpannaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pariyāpanno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:192.1_0: Apariyāpannaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca apariyāpanno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.13:193.1_0: Pariyāpannaṁ abyākatañca apariyāpannaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca pariyāpanno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:195.1_0: Niyyānikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca niyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:196.1_0: Aniyyānikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:198.1_0: Aniyyānikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyyāniko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:199.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:201.1_0: Aniyyānikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyyāniko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:202.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:204.1_0: Niyataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca niyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:205.1_0: Aniyataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:207.1_0: Niyataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca niyato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:208.1_0: Aniyataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:209.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve), avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:211.1_0: Niyato akusalo dhammo niyatassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.13:212.1_0: Aniyato akusalo dhammo aniyatassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:214.1_0: Aniyataṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:216.1_0: Sauttaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sauttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:217.1_0: Anuttaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:219.1_0: Sauttaraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sauttaro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:221.1_0: Sauttaraṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sauttaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:222.1_0: Anuttaraṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anuttaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.13:223.1_0: Sauttaraṁ abyākatañca anuttaraṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sauttaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.13:224.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:226.1_0: Araṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:228.1_0: Saraṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:230.1_0: Araṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:232.1_0: Araṇo abyākato dhammo araṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.13:233.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
